analysis.description:
ETToken._acceptDividends (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#324-331) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.transfer(beneficiaryShare) (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#330-331)

Floor._processDividends (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#472-483) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- address(baseContract).transfer(_value) (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#477-478)

Reentrancy in CauldronsMinigamePresale.pickWinners (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#701-762):
	External calls:
	- horseMaster() != 0x0 (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#736-739)
	- horseMaster().transfer(remainingReward.mul(5).div(100)) (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#738)
	- _processDividends(remainingReward) (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#744)
	- baseContract.transfer(winner1,winner1Reward) (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#747-748)
	- baseContract.transfer(winner2,winner2Reward) (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#750)
	- baseContract.transfer(winner3,winner3Reward) (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#750-751)
	- baseContract.burn(remainingReward) (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#753)
	External calls sending eth:
	- winner1.transfer(winner1Reward) (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#730)
	- winner2.transfer(winner2Reward) (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#730-732)
	- winner3.transfer(winner3Reward) (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#732-733)
	- horseMaster().transfer(remainingReward.mul(5).div(100)) (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#738)
	- _processDividends(remainingReward) (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#744)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- cauldrons (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#762)
Floor._isContract (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#465-471) is declared view but contains assembly code

CauldronsMinigamePresale.pickWinners (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#701-762) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-baseContract.transfer(winner1,winner1Reward) (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#747-748)
	-baseContract.transfer(winner2,winner2Reward) (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#750)
	-baseContract.transfer(winner3,winner3Reward) (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#750-751)

Floor._isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#465-471)
	- /unique_chucks/3/0x9022a78192061d3d1048f10016050a3dc7339283.sol#470-471
